7thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Fire Storm
7thLevelDruidSpells.Description: A storm made up of sheets of roaring flame appears in a location you choose within range.

7thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Mirage Arcane
7thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You make terrain in an area up to 1 mile square look, sound, smell, and even feel like some other sort of terrain.

7thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Plane Shift
7thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence.

7thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Regenerate
7thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature and stimulate its natural healing ability.

7thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Reverse Gravity
7thLevelDruidSpells.Description: This spell reverses gravity in a 50-foot-radius, 100-foot high cylinder centered on a point within range.
